pkgmetadata.longdescription: LibreOffice is a fork of OpenOffice.org. This ebuild allows you to compile it yourself. Unfortunately this compilation can take up to a day depending on the speed of your computer. It will however make a snappier openoffice than the binary version

use.flag: Enable support for legacy StarOffice 5.x and earlier file formats
Generate debug info for binfilter code (not recommended, huge files result)
Enable support for non-Roman fonts via media-gfx/graphite2
Build extension for non-linear solving in calc
Build pdf-import extension using app-text/poppler. Note that you don't need this for pdf-export!
Enable support for VBA compatibility and ActiveX embedding
Adds support for HTTP content adding via net-libs/neon
Adds support for document signing using internal modified dev-libs/xmlsec and system dev-libs/nss
